title: #220: The Boogieman From Budapest
description:
With an origin story like the one George Soros has, it is almost impossible to not go on to become a monstrous super-villain. Pillaging his own people, while pretending to be someone else, and working with the Nazi’s S.S. division really sets the tone for the rest of a person’s life.

With a start like that, is it really a surprise that George Soros went on to become a master manipulator and producer of multiple “color revolutions” across many continents?

What is his plan for the Open Society Foundation that he runs his “charity” work through, and is he really a philanthropist just looking to help humanity? Or is Soros part of a much larger agenda with plans for a one-world government and massive depopulation?
